EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - Follow Up - Attended Partner Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending Tricenis Partner Day 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you so much for attending Partner Day 2015! It was a wonderful day of presentations, updates, and networking. We appreciate your taking the time from your busy schedule to join us in Vienna!
Want to revisit some of the presentations from Partner Day? You can now find all of the presentations available for download/on our website here <#>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>.
Best regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
